JH Technologies 宣布与 VacTradeUK 建立战略合作伙伴关系，在美国分销先进的真空镀膜系统JH Technologies 是一家领先的科学仪器和设备供应商，很高兴地宣布与先进真空镀膜系统的知名制造商 VacTradeUK 建立战略合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/JH-Technologies-announces-strategic-partnership-with-VacTradeUK-to-distribute-advanced-vacuum-coating-systems-in-the-United-States。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/JH-Technologies-announces-strategic-partnership-with-VacTradeUK-to-distribute-advanced-vacuum-coating-systems-in-the-United-States。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f933af4-00b7-4e04-8d47-85e6b6a961be Tue, 16 Jul 2024 05:56:00 -0400
Optibrium 任命 James Halle 为首席商务官重要任命带来了丰富的软件商业经验，以推动全球增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Optibrium-appoints-James-Halle-as-Chief-Commercial-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Optibrium-appoints-James-Halle-as-Chief-Commercial-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66c99eec-f6b0-4e97-aeda-d1da85968c82 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 05:53:00 -0400 Optibrium appoints James Halle as Chief Commercial Officer
芝加哥大学通过新的制造设施扩大微生物组研究能力芝加哥大学杜乔索瓦家庭研究所 (DFI) 可以生产临床级的封装细菌，从而为更好地了解微生物组及其在人类健康中的多种作用提供机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/UChicago-expands-microbiome-research-capability-with-new-manufacturing-facility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/UChicago-expands-microbiome-research-capability-with-new-manufacturing-facility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2968145-5270-45df-ab08-7e05503ffce6 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 05:46:00 -0400 UChicago expands microbiome research capabilities with new manufacturing facility
慢性荨麻疹：解决未满足的需求、新兴疗法和个性化治疗方法的进步新兴的慢性荨麻疹个性化治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Chronic-Urticaria-Addressing-unmet-needs-emerging-therapies-and-advances-in-personalized-treatment-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Chronic-Urticaria-Addressing-unmet-needs-emerging-therapies-and-advances-in-personalized-treatment-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1ae1058-74aa-4662-a584-d7bea5017a1c Tue, 16 Jul 2024 05:24:00 -0400 Chronic Urticaria: Addressing unmet needs, emerging therapies, and advances in personalized treatment approaches
随着年龄的增长，自恋会发生什么变化？研究显示下降趋势结合各种长期研究的数据，了解自恋在人的一生中如何变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/What-happens-to-narcissism-as-we-age-Research-shows-declined-trends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/What-happens-to-narcissism-as-we-age-Research-shows-declined-trends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59142655-bc5f-4dbc-b751-dfce00bfab88 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 04:40:00 -0400 What happens to narcissism as we age? Research shows declining trends
新研究发现 Omega-3 脂肪酸可显着减少痤疮最近的研究强调，omega-3 脂肪酸可显着减轻痤疮的严重程度。补充剂和地中海饮食改善了大多数研究参与者的皮肤状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Omega-3-fatty-acids-found-to-significantly-reduce-acne-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Omega-3-fatty-acids-found-to-significantly-reduce-acne-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b10d585d-be7a-4dee-b8d2-79e68fa7593b Tue, 16 Jul 2024 00:46:00 -0400 Omega-3 fatty acids found to significantly reduce acne in new study
研究表明口服索马鲁肽治疗 2 型糖尿病的依从性和持久性与 DPP-4i 相当研究人员发现，口服索马鲁肽的 T2D 患者的依从性和持久性与 DPP-4i 相似，但索马鲁肽使用者需要较少的并发药物治疗，表明长期疗效更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Study-shows-oral-semaglutide-matches-DPP-4i-in-adherence-and-persistence-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Study-shows-oral-semaglutide-matches-DPP-4i-in-adherence-and-persistence-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c837b90-bb43-4619-98b9-1d93cd48413d Tue, 16 Jul 2024 00:33:00 -0400 Study shows oral semaglutide matches DPP-4i in adherence and persistence for type 2 diabetes
肥胖或超重会降低精液质量吗？中国的研究人员发现，肥胖与男性精液质量下降之间存在显着关联，其中重度肥胖者的精液质量下降幅度最大。该研究强调了保持健康体重对男性生殖健康的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Does-being-obese-or-overweight-reduce-semen-quality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Does-being-obese-or-overweight-reduce-semen-quality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0da44e0-e772-4dac-a4d5-9920957ff058 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 00:09:00 -0400 Does being obese or overweight reduce semen quality?
利用脑蛋白增强糖尿病和减肥药物密歇根大学的最新研究表明，中枢神经系统中发现的蛋白质网络可以用来提高流行的糖尿病和减肥药物的有效性并减少副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Harnessing-brain- Proteins-for-enhanced-diabetes-and-weight-loss-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Harnessing-brain- Proteins-for-enhanced-diabetes-and-weight-loss-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74de0017-ae28-400f-b62f-198b2168d75b Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:51:46 -0400 Harnessing brain proteins for enhanced diabetes and weight-loss drugs
低GI地中海饮食可以提高糖尿病易感成年人的生活质量，但不能提高睡眠质量研究人员发现，低血糖指数地中海饮食可以改善与健康相关的生活质量的某些方面，但不能改善有 2 型糖尿病风险的成年人的睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Low-GI-Mediterranean-diet-boosts-quality-of-life-but-not-sleep-in-diabetes-prone-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Low-GI-Mediterranean-diet-boosts-quality-of-life-but-not-sleep-in-diabetes-prone-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=415fa592-732b-435a-baeb-c0e919462d10 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Low-GI Mediterranean diet boosts quality of life but not sleep in diabetes-prone adults
